hints.title: Comprehensive Validation Suite
hints.content:
3590: :label: alg-comprehensive-validation
3591: 
3592: **Test 1: Ideal Gas Benchmark**
3593: - Run on ideal gas with known thermodynamics
3594: - Expected: $R_{\text{Rupp}} \approx 0$ (flat geometry)
3595: - Expected: $g_W = T \cdot g_R$ (conformal duality)
3596: 
3597: **Test 2: Van der Waals Gas**
3598: - Run near critical point $(T_c, P_c)$
3599: - Expected: $R_{\text{Rupp}} \to -\infty$ (negative divergence at liquid-gas transition)
3600: - Compare to analytical prediction
3601: 
3602: **Test 3: Ising Model (if applicable)**
3603: - Run Monte Carlo Ising on 2D lattice
3604: - Expected: $R_{\text{Rupp}} \to +\infty$ at Curie temperature $T_c$
3605: - Match critical exponent $\alpha$ from $R \sim |T - T_c|^{-\alpha'}$
3606: 
3607: **Test 4: Convergence Study**
3608: - Vary $N$: $10^3, 10^4, 10^5, 10^6$
3609: - Plot $\log \|\hat{g}_R - g_R^{\text{true}}\|$ vs. $\log N$
3610: - Expected slope: $-2/(d+4)$ (Theorem {prf:ref}`thm-ruppeiner-convergence`)
3611: 
3612: **Test 5: Cross-Validation**
3613: - Split QSD samples: training/test sets
3614: - Estimate metric on training, evaluate likelihood on test
3615: - High likelihood → good density estimation
